DASHBOARD_MODULES_PANEL_NO_MODULES: No modules are available at this time.
DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_CREATE_ERROR: There was an error creating the dashboard.
DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_IMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_F: Invalid dashboard file. Only files exported from a UniFi Controller can be imported here.
DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_IMPORT_ERROR_MISSING_M: The imported dashboard doesn't have any widgets.
DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_IMPORT_ERROR_INCOMPATI: This dashboard was created in version {{dashboardControllerVersion}} of the UniFi Controller. This controller is running {{currentControllerVersion}}. Please update to a newer version of the controller in order to use all the widgets in this dashboard.
DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_SAVE_ERROR: There was an error saving the {{name}} dashboard.
DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_SAVE_ERROR_READ_ONLY: Unable to save the {{name}} dashboard. It is read-only.
DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_REMOVE_ERROR: There was an error removing the {{name}} dashboard.
